title: How do I get out of MMR hell
body: I am a B4 mid laner that is currently at a 36% winrate. I started playing ranked at the season start and did pretty shit and only knew how to play a few champions. from there I put my winrate down the shitter but in that time I have really learned how to master my lanes and the champions I play. I always play {{champion:45}} because hes good against low elo players and because I always get told 1 tricking is best in low elo. The biggest problem right now is that I am matched with very dumb teams which gets me to losing streaks such as feeding trundle top laners and feeding towerdiving nasus jungle. I try to keep my cool in these games but its hard because it seems like every game I do is just a coinflip and most of the time the team I get is a joke. Its really hard to climb at this point and I want to see what u guys think and if u guys ever been here. I really dont like feeding trundles so help pls

replies.body: Abandon that account and make a new one using the knowledge you now have. You can't fix your win rate now and frankly, the LP loss is just too harsh at this point. You're fighting 6 players now; 5 enemies, and the match making system.

I have been tryingto do that but the grind to lvl 30 just takes too much time and is very boring and I lose motivation to get the account to level 30 thinking of how long it took me to get my main account there. I also am young so I dont have money to buy EXP boosts.
It will probably take you less time to level a new account to lv 30 than to fix a 36% winrate. Being someone who already knows how to play the game you'll win more and level up quicker.

This is why Riot should allow you to hard reset your account.  Ask to have all stats cleared.   Why should I have to make a new account.  Just let me start over on current one.   NOTHING is hurt in allowing it.

Having a rank and then an entirely different hidden rank is pretty dumb, it amazes me it's still in place. What exactly is the point of earning a rank of its not an indication of my current skill level? Mind numbing.

There is just one thing you need to realize if you wanna climb.
Change this "I have dumb teams" mindset.
You need to understand that you can't change other people but you can change your playstyle/skill.
You are the only constant in all your games.
If you always say you lost because of the others you will never try to improve yourself.
Keep in mind that other players also play with these "dumb" teams and still climb.

If you need tips for laning, check out these channel:

https://www.youtube.com/user/SkillCappedDotNet

And don't listen to this "36% isn't fixable" and "make a new account" bullshit.
Just play, play, play.
If you really try to improve (watching guides on YT etc.) you will climb some day.
I appreciate the help best help reply I have gotten so far {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Honestly that doesn't sound fixable at all. Either just keep playing for fun until season reset or make a new account.

Your skill level and MMR is probably somewhere on iron 2-3, you are just in bronze 4 because of the league system preventing downmotion.

Unless you _greatly_ improve your gameplay and pick up a 10ish games win streak, you're never fixing your MMR this season. You can just keep playing for fun (I did that at plat V 0 LP hell last season i knew i would never rank up i just stopped giving a shit after a while and just tried to have fun) if that's what you want. But don't expect to fix that winrate in one or two days of playing.

This is one of the BLARING problems with Riots MMR system.   Accounts get locked into a rank and no matter how good you play you cant get out of it because its a Rigged system.  Once it thinks you should be at a Rank it will do its damnedest to make sure you stay there.   Its like having a Rubber band attached to your back and a Rank spot.  You can win and win and the climb up in the rank but the Rubber band gets stronger and stronger pulling you back until you start losing.  THEN it throws you down so far you might as well never have played in the first place.

Having to make a new account to try and stick that Rubber band at a higher place is stupid.   

The system does not allow for you to improve fast unless its a new account.

It WANTS you to play 1000 games to go from B4 to B1

The system should just not hold you on B4 if your MMR is on iron 3. It looks really frustrating because the MMR system wants you to go down to gold/bronze/whatever but the league system locks you on platinum/silver/whatever. So the MMR system makes sure you never rank up.

And yeah, it takes way too much effort to fix bad MMR. I've been in Legend on Hearthstone and climbed from 16k (absolute hell) to top 500 in two days of good winrate. If that had been riot's league system i would've probably climbed 1000 positions or the like.
by actually enjoying it. it is only hell if you hate it. so by simply letting your hate go and liking it it will not longer be hell for you.

1. Find a duo who cares about ranking up as much as you do

2. Find your highest winrate champion and play them until they are no longer viable, preferably one that can fill two positions like support and mid or adc and mid or top and jungle

3. Play to improve, not to win and you will soon find the LP coming to you ( if you consistently improve above your rank ), rather than you searching for it

Best of Luck in the Fields of Justice summoner!

I coach mid @ twitch.tv/rock_md if you're interested.

When I'm not online I have a ton of VODs up for use.

Switch to {{champion:1}}, She hasa better laning, she doesn't run out of mana, and has a no counterplay combo while also being good to carry teams by setting them up and one shotting them. then after you get better at the game knowledge-wise you can start picking up other champs.
